description:
The MOD11B1.005 dataset was decommissioned as of April 9, 2018. 

The MODIS/Terra V5 LST/E L3 Global 1 Km Grid (Short name: MOD11B1) products incorporate 6 km pixels, which are produced daily using the day/night LST algorithm (Wan and Li, 1997). This algorithm extracts average temperatures (in Kelvin) and applies them to a pair of MODIS daytime and nighttime observations. This method yields 1 K accuracy for materials with known emissivities. The six thermal band emissivities are retrieved through the day/night algorithm. The data inputs include the MODIS L1B calibrated and geolocated radiances, geolocation, cloud mask, atmospheric profiles, land and snow cover.

The V5 MOD11B1 products are a gridded version of the level-2 LST product (MOD11_L2) mapped and projected on 6-kilometer (precisely 5.6 km) Sinusoidal grids. The MOD11B1 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, and emissivities from bands 20, 22, 23, 29, 31, and 32. It also includes daytime and nighttime LSTs generated from the 1-km, band 31 of the level-2 MOD11_L2 product aggregated to 6 km grids.

The V5 Terra/MODIS LST/E products, including MOD11B1, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MOD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 MOD11B1 product’s acquisition range started March 5, 2000 (2000-065), and continue through March 30, 2017. The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Temporal Coverage: V005  March 5, 2000 –
Area: ~1100 x 1100 km 
Image Dimensions: 200 x 200 rows/columns 
Resolution: 6 kilometer (actual: 5.6km) 
File Size: ~0.4 MB compressed 
Projection: Sinusoidal 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 18
title: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Daily L3 Global 6km SIN Grid V005

usgs.title: Direct Download [1]
usgs.description: USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.
